doc.summary: FVS report not produced as scheduled
doc.notes: FVS batch job ran later than usual time. BBRP scheduler wasn't set up properly. Need to reconfigure the scheduler

workinfo.notes: Asked task to be created against HP Web Apps. Configuration instructions were emailed
HP Web Apps completed Configuration changes, waiting scheduler to start up and process messages
Scheduler started all messages processed. New report generated
Client now receiving latest report. Verified in MEIG. BDV requested. Closing the task

doc.notes: MEIG node 1 not responding, all traffic goes through node2. Need to check the health status of the node1 and restart MEIG Node1 Application

workinfo.notes: Asked task to be created against HP Web Apps. Health check of the server requested before restarted

workinfo.summary: Disk full, move all logs to E drive
workinfo.notes: HP Web Apps completed health check. Old log files moved to E drive and application restarted

workinfo.summary: New traffic goes through node1, closing task
workinfo.notes: Both MEIG nodes up, load balance between nodes. Closing the task
